text: Kintu moi tumikhan laga bhirodh te ase: Tumikhan majote Balaam laga sikhai diya kotha etiya bhi kunba dhori kene ase, kun pora Balak ke Israel laga bacha khan usorte dukh digdar anibole nimite dise, taikhan ke murti puja kori kene diya laga khan khilai kene biya kaam kori bole dibo nimite2.14 2 Pet. 2:15; Num. 31:16..
